      • buildEnvelope

        public static Envelope buildEnvelope(FeatureDataStore dataStore,
                                     FeatureSetQueryParameters params)
        For a given feature data store, query all feature sets and build a bounds envelope which encompasses all features
        Parameters:
        dataStore - Feature data store
        params - Feature set query params (null to query all)
        Returns:
        Bounds envelope or null if failed

      • buildEnvelope

        public static Envelope buildEnvelope(FeatureDataStore dataStore)
        Given a datastore, build the envelope for it
        Parameters:
        dataStore - the datastore
        Returns:
        the envelope that contains the datastore

      • buildEnvelope

                                     FeatureSet featureSet)
        Build an envelope for a single feature set by querying its features
        Parameters:
        dataStore - The associated data store
        featureSet - Feature set
        Returns:
        Envelope bounds or null if failed
